Summary: light in sky stationary then changed derection
divs: Sighting Detailsi was monsoon season i went out the east side of the house to see if there were any storms i seen clouds way off in the distance to the NE. I looked striaght up and seen a bright star and i thought that's not the north star. then it flew to the west with a path like the shape of the top of a candy cane. the fuchsia and the roof were in the way as it flew. so that's all i seen
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
